About Me

Superman Logo

Role: Logo Design
Year: 2013

I recently stumbled upon this infographic of all Superman emblems in all comics and movies since the first comic book in 19#####, and was surprised that I thought every single one of them sucks (Yes, even the new one from Man of Steel). I had never given it much thought before as it is one of those ubiquitous symbols you see everywhere, but seeing all versions of it side by side made me realize how terrible it really is.

So I thought It’d be a fun project to try and redesign it.

I wanted to stay as close as I could to the original emblems, so I chose the 20##### symbol from the comic book series as my starting point. From there I just kind of
